    • Matterhorn

    Project management for multiple people and projects.

    What I did

    • Product Design
    • User Experience
    • User Interface
    • Visual Identity
    • HTML5/CSS3

    Matterhorn is web-based project management tool that I have been involved in designing and building over the past year.

    Matterhorn has had multiple iterations based on internal and external user testing and feedback. I studied user behaviours and preferences to define and refine the core features and functionalities of the product. I have also been involved in the planning around itâ€™s recent launch including marketing strategy, copywriting and designing the landing page.
